amendment.description: To prevent the Secretary of Health and Human Services from modifying the treatment of certain long-term hospitals as subsection (d) hospitals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1056 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1056 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S8681, S8683; text: CR S8683) To prevent the Secretary of Health and Human Services from modifying the treatment of certain long-term hospitals as subsection (d) hospitals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1056 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Shelby.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1056 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
